Installing SpectreÂ¶

  1. Setup Fantom 1.0.56 or newer from official site;

  2. Download mustache templates from public github distr:

    >>> git clone https://github.com/tonsky/mustache.git

    and build it:

    >>> fan mustache/build.fan

  3. Download Spectre from private bitbucket repository:

    >>> hg clone https://<your_username>@bitbucket.org/xored/spectre

    and build it:

    >>> fan spectre/build.fan

Congratulations! You now have Spectre installed. Move onto Getting started section.
